select new com.jshx.lddbqk.entity.LeaCla(t.id, t.areaName, t.plannedMonth, t.companyName,t.auditResults,t.auditState) from LeaCla t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.plannedMonth = :plannedMonth
and t.auditState = :auditState
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
order by t.createTime desc
